data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Saint Anne Sandy Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Anne Sandy Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Saint Anne Sandy Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Saint Anne Sandy Point.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Saint Anne Sandy Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis to the gospel today.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sandy Point Town
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sandy Point Town, Saint Anne Sandy Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis.
Father, please give the people in the state of Saint Anne Sandy Point access to a Bible in their own language.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Saint Anne Sandy Point do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.focus_label: Saint Anne Sandy Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Saint Anne Sandy Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

location.name: Saint Anne Sandy Point
location.full_name: Saint Anne Sandy Point, Saint Kitts and Nevis
